fullText: Though 'Bandstand' hits some false notes in its story of traumatized World War II veterans, its heart is huge and its big band sound is intoxicating.
dtliExcerpt: Though 'Bandstand' hits some false notes in its story of traumatized World War II veterans, its heart is huge and its big band sound is intoxicating.
